name: DOOMOLINGO
description:
Too many people were missing their Spanish lessons and Duo went insane. It's now up to you to stop him before he takes over the world! Made if 15 days for Metroidvania Month 19 (lol).

WASD to move.

F to attack.

use your mouse to aim the Streak Freeze Blast (when you get it)

If the game suddenly freezes in the middle of the final boss fight that means you killed duo! Congratulations!

Good luck!
